ORIGIN_BASE_URL.description: The full base url of the origin. For example https://my-api.company.com

ORIGIN_KEY.description: Create a 64-character alfa-numeric secure random key for this. It's a shared secret between this proxy and origin.

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Follow instructions in https://github.com/bitly/oauth2_proxy to create Google OAuth2 client id and secret

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Follow instructions in https://github.com/bitly/oauth2_proxy to create Google OAuth2 client id and secret

SESSION_SECRET.description: Create a 64-character alfa-numeric secure random key for this

MAX_BODY_SIZE.description: Max limit what this express app will accept as body.

LOG_LEVEL.description: How verbose logging is wanted. Winston levels are used: debug, info, warn, error
